actions.name: Power Leech

cost.trigger: The user causes another creature to gain @Affliction[fainted].

actions.description:
Trigger: The user causes another creature to gain @Affliction[fainted].
Effect: The user gains +1 stage to two random stats (ATK, DEF, SPATK, SPDEF, ACC, EVA, CRIT) for 5 activations.

system.description:
